Facebook's voting reminder

Facebook's voting reminder — Roughly 100 million people saw a reminder that it’s Election Day and information about their local polling location. Also, seeing that “I voted” status all over Facebook was a perfect example of positive peer pressure.

Published November 3 2014

Enjoy your day.
